fields.description:
With the new Titanium SDK 5.0 and above, when you use Android modules on Android 6.0, the app will crash citing `text relocation` errors. Modules need to be updated and rebuild. Some of the modules have already been updated.

List from TIMOB-17928:-

h5. Commonly Used
ti.compression (MOD-2163) (Updated. No Issue.)
ti.imagefactory (MOD-2166) (Updated. No Issue.)
ti.paint (MOD-2167) (Updated. No Issue.)
ti.flurry (MOD-2181)
h5. Packaged with the SDK
ti.facebook: https://github.com/appcelerator-modules/ti.facebook (Recently Updated)
ti.map: https://github.com/appcelerator-modules/ti.map (Recently Updated)

h5. Important Enterprise Modules
appcelerator.encrypteddatabase (TIMOB-19206) (Updated. No Issue)
com.appcelerator.apm (TIMOB-19293) (Updated. No Issue.)
appcelerator.https (TIMOB-19729) (Updated. No Issue.)
ti.geofence: (No Issue.)
ti.ldap: (No Issue.)
ti.crypto: (No Issue.)
ti.inappbilling (MOD-2154) (Updated. No Issue.)
fields.summary: Android: Rebuild supported closed and open source modules for Android 6.0
